SELECT n.board_no noticeNo , b.board_title noticeTitle , b.board_content noticeContent , b.board_category noticeCategory , b.member_id memberId , b.board_privilege noticePrivilege , b.board_blind boardBlind , b.board_create_date noticeCreateDate , b.board_update_date noticeUpdateDate
FROM notice n INNER JOIN board b ON n.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_privilege <= #{memberLevel} AND b.board_blind = 'N' ORDER BY n.board_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice n INNER JOIN board b ON n.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_privilege <= #{memberLevel} AND b.board_blind = 'N'

SELECT n.board_no noticeNo , b.board_title noticeTitle , b.board_content noticeContent , b.board_blind noticeBlind , b.member_id memberId , b.board_category noticeCategory , b.board_privilege noticePrivilege , b.board_create_date noticeCreateDate , b.board_update_date noticeUpdateDate FROM notice n INNER JOIN board b ON n.board_no = b.board_no WHERE b.board_blind = 'N' AND n.board_no = #{noticeNo}
SELECT board_file_name noticeFileName FROM board_file WHERE board_no = #{noticeNo}

SELECT board_file_no noticeFileNo ,board_file_name noticeFileName ,board_file_origin_name noticeFileOriginName ,board_file_type noticeFileType ,board_file_size noticeFileSize FROM board_file WHERE board_no = #{noticeNo}
